about_the_game:
legend of kungfu is an action role-playing and action-adventure genre.
The game combines action, adventure, puzzle solving, role playing, and Chinese mythology; The game also contains a lot of platform jumping, diving, racing and so on.
We cleverly integrated 3D effects into the game, making the game from the top view look like embossed sand table, full of depth.
This series is built with creative games, interesting characters with Chinese characteristics, and unique world view.
The game is based on personal accumulation of "experience" and "upgrade", we start from the perspective of developing the world, enter the game according to the main task prompts and complete, the game "experience" accumulated on their own, as long as you are skilled and skilled, it is very simple to play.
The goal of the game is to help Sun Wukong destroy the enemy, find the key to open the door, and finally defeat the enemy BOSS!
Our game is based on the main flow of maze after maze. There is a high degree of freedom in the main flow. It is up to the players to decide which place to go first and which task to complete first.
